reason_for_recall: Northern Fish Products is recalling hot smoked salmon, black cod, steelhead, and trout, with the exception of hot jerky salmon and jerky salmon due to undeclared soy.

The firm issued a press release on May 6, 2016, which encouraged consumers with affected bottles to return the product to the store for a refund.  The recall will extend through the wholesale and retail distribution chain via scripted phone notification.  The firm has informed distributors/retails to remove the product from shelves and track by using the best by date and sku.  Products should be destroyed.  The information has been posted on the firm website.
product_quantity: 3617 12-8oz. bottle cases, 27218 12-16oz. bottle cases, 22241 12-32oz. bottle cases, and 9082 4-gallon cases
code_info: Affected Production Dates are:   "Home Style 8, 16 or 32 oz. bottles:  "Case dates between 12/22/16 and 4/11/16 are recalled.  "Gallons with case dates between 12/28/2015 and 4/10/2016 are recalled.             Affected Best By dates are:  "Home Style 8, 16 or 32 oz. bottles:  "Bottles with Best By dates between 9/19/16 and 1/7/16 are recalled.   "Gallons with Best By dates between 6/16/16 and 10/11/16 are recalled.
distribution_pattern: Coverage is predominately the Midwest, specifically Nebraska, Iowa, Kansas, Colorado and South Dakota.  Smaller concentration of stores in ND, WY, UT, OK, TX, MN and WI.
